Talk_82:
<sp:3:0:2:0801>Ah! <sp:5:0:0>You really came to visit! Thanks again
for helping my family back in
Kakariko Village.
<sp:3:0:2:0101><snd:LaughS_01>You wouldn't BELIEVE who I've been
studying fashion under! <sp:5:0:0>Cece herself!<sp:5:0:0>
I'm so lucky to have her as my mentor.
She's asked me to help around the shop,
so I'm trying to bring in customers.

<sp:3:0:2:0401>Oh, <sp:5:0:0>that's right!
Talk_83:
<sp:3:0:2:0801><snd:TalkPositive>Everyone knows Cece's a great designer,
but did you know that she's an avid
fashion collector too?
So if you're kicking yourself for letting go
of some clothes you can't find at a store,<sp:5:0:0>
you should talk to my mentor, Cece!
Talk_84:
<sp:3:0:2:0801>Want to start your day off in style?
You've come to the right place!
Talk_90:
<sp:3:0:2:0b01><snd:SurpriseS>Your clothes!<sp:5:0:0> Not only did you have an
outfit for a rainy day but it's stylish too?<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0801>You really know your fashion!
Talk_91:
<sp:3:0:2:0b01><snd:SurpriseS>Um, the way you're dressed...<sp:5:0:0><sp:0:4:0>You sold some clothes you didn't mean
to, didn't you? And then couldn't find a
place to buy it again.
Now here you are, standing around in
your underwear, wishing you could get
them back. <sp:5:0:0>Is that it?
<sp:3:0:2:0801><snd:TalkPositive>Then you need to talk to <clr:0000>Cece<clr:ffff>!<sp:0:4:0>She's not just an innovative designer,
but a devoted collector too!
Talk_85:
<sp:3:0:2:0801>Oh, hello! <sp:5:0:0>You came to visit us again!<sp:5:0:0>
Thank you!
Talk_86:
<sp:3:0:2:0801><snd:SurpriseS_01>Have you ever gotten rid of a piece
of clothing you can't find in a shop?
It's the worst!
If you ever find yourself in that situation,
come talk to my mentor. I know she'll be
able to help you out!
Talk_87:
<sp:3:0:2:0801>What better way to enjoy the nightlife
than with clothes that glitter in the dark?
Talk_88:
<sp:3:0:2:0801>Looking for a way to shine in the rain?
We've got the outfit for you!
Talk_94:
<sp:3:0:2:0b01><snd:SurpriseS_01>That hat!<sp:5:0:0> Could it be? Is that the
legendary Cece hat?!<sp:0:4:0>Did she give it to you personally?!<sp:5:0:0> Aaah!
That's so amazing!
Talk_89:
<sp:3:0:2:0401><snd:SurpriseM_01>Whoa, hey! <sp:5:0:0>We're going to get wet talking
in the rain! <sp:5:0:0>Let's find some cover!
Talk_95:
<sp:3:0:2:0c01><sp:0:2:2:5000>The Cece hat is just as gorgeous as people say.<sp:5:0:0>
Cece really does make the most amazing things.<sp:0:2:2:6400>
Talk_96:
<sp:3:0:2:0101><snd:LaughS_01>I just have to tell you, the way you've
colored your clothes is so pretty!<sp:0:4:0>The color combinations are just perfect.<sp:5:0:0>
This must be Kochi Dye Shop work, right?<sp:0:4:0>I'll have to have them dye my clothes like
that next time I stop in!
Talk_81:
<sp:3:0:2:0101><snd:Greeting_00>Welcome to Hateno Village's premier
boutique, Ventest Clothing!
